hi, Bro...

@ /veer1989/ Go to start menu - in search type: bitdefender wait until the file appear in the list it will show clearly with the Logo - right click on it & run as administrator to install... if you require more help do never hesitate to ask i'll be ready to help... try Buddy & let me know if done.
